I believe it has the potential to bring significant value to your business and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to make a one-time offer of $1600000 to make this deal happen. This is a fair price considering the product's worth to you, and I'm willing to make a concession to get it to you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,600,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,600,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer
